mapper.select: /* USE : PosServiceMapper.getPrintTypeList */ SELECT tcp.PRT_CLASS_CD AS VALUE, tcp.PRT_CLASS_NM AS NAME FROM TB_CM_PRINT tcp ORDER BY tcp.PRT_CLASS_CD

/* USE : PosServiceMapper.getPrintCodeList */ SELECT tcpd.PRT_CD, tcpc.CONTENT, tcpc.SAMPL_YN FROM TB_CM_PRINT_DTL tcpd LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM_PRINT_CODE tcpc ON tcpd.PRT_CD = tcpc.PRT_CD WHERE tcpd.PRT_CLASS_CD = #{prtClassCd} ORDER BY tcpd.DISP_SEQ
